words.word_translated: to memorize, to learn by heart
words.sentence_translated: He learns a song by heart.

words.sentence: Hij heeft toegegeven en wil helpen.
words.sentence_translated: He conceded and wants to help.

words.sentence: Het is zwak om toe te geven.
Hij is zwak en irriteert zichzelf.
words.sentence_translated: He is weak and annoys himself.
